name: Finding Tobu's Wings
description:
Tobu is a Winged Guardian that cannot fly, stunted at birth by climate change. However, she still has a secret power within her to unlock. She uses it to help her friends and along the way, she discovers that all things are connected. Only with the help of her enemies can she restore balance in the world.

Gameplay

A classic fantasy JRPG that consists of battling with team members against enemies.

Controls:

WASD to move

'Enter' / 'Return' - Advance Dialog

Credits
